```markdown
Term 1 (nested) with: -
: - Definition 1 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
    - Sub 2 with: -
  - Definition 2 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
    - Sub 2 with: -
  - Definition 3 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
    - Sub 2 with: -

Term 2 (nested) with: -
: - Definition 1 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
      - Pub 1 with: -
  - Definition 2 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
      - Pub 1 with: -
  - Definition 3 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
      - Pub 1 with: -
```

```markdown

: Definition @ 1
  - Definition 1 with: -

      - Pub 1 with: -

  - Definition 2 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
      - Pub 1 with: -

  - Definition 3 with: -
    - Sub 1 with: -
      - Pub 1 with: -
